RelayDirectiveUtil

public RelayDirectiveUtil()
Method Detail

getRelayDirective

public static RelayDirective getRelayDirective(Directive directive)
Return the given Directive as RelayDirective if possible. Otherwise return null. Usually this just involves a downcast. If the given Directive has change reports we need to extract the true Directive it holds and operate on that one instead.

hasRelayDirectives

public static boolean hasRelayDirectives(Message message)
Returns:
true iff any of the Directives in the given message, directly or indirectly, are RelayDirectives.

makeReceiptDirective

public static Directive makeReceiptDirective(RelayDirective original,
                                             java.lang.Object receipt)
Make a receipt directive for the given relay and receipt

makeReceiptMessage

public static Message makeReceiptMessage(MessageAddress originator,
                                         DirectiveMessage message,
                                         java.lang.Object receipt)
Make a receipt message fro the given directive message, using the given receipt in each RelayDirective.
